info.name: Performance Dashboard API
info.description: This API defines the endpoints available in the Performance Dashboard on AWS Rest API. It includes public endpoints and private endpoints that require authentication

request.description: Retrieves a dashboard that has been published
Returns homepage title, description and a list of dashboards

item.name: Get Public Homepage with Search Query

request.description: Returns homepage title, description and a list of dashboards with content that matches the query
Unlike regular Datasets, a Metrics dataset has a defined schema to populate Content Items of type "Metrics".
